import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./Weather.css"; import axios from "axios" export default function Weather() { let [temperature,setTemperature] = useState("") let apiKey = "caa883a4a60d93878755b08a933f74ea"; let apiUrl = `https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=London&appid=${apiKey}` axios.get(apiUrl).then(handleResponse); function handleResponse(response){ setTemperature(Math.round(response.data.main.temp)) } return (
